Sequence Information.Peptide Name: TtAP-1 (natural AMPs;XXA, UCLL1c, scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Venom, the Trinidad Thick-Tailed Scorpion,Tityus trinitatis

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (92%) toscorpine Im5L: 20%; F=S=K: 16%: 13%. GRAVY: 0.372; Mol W: 2798.4; Mol formula: C135H217N33O31; Mol Ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against P. aeruginosa DSM 50071 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), E. coli DSM 787 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC BAA 1705 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), A. baumannii DSM 30008 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC 43300 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), S. epidermidis DSM 28319 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), E. faecalis MF 06036 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), E. faecium NCTC 12201 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), and C. difficile DSM 27147 or ATCC BAA 1382 (MIC 3.13 ug/ml).Toxicity: murine RBC: HC50 18 ug/ml, highly hemolytic.
Literature Information.Author: Mechkarska M, Cunning TS, Taggart MG, Ternan NG, Leprince J, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Tena-Garc√©s J, Calvete JJ, Conlon JM. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Identification of an Antimicrobial Peptide from the Venom of the Trinidad Thick-Tailed Scorpion Tityus trinitatis with Potent Activity against ESKAPE Pathogens and Clostridioides difficile.
